title: Relaxing Srinagar Escape near Shalimar Bagh with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Dining Discount
description: Apple Orchard Resort & Spa Srinagar, a gem in the heart of Jannat-e-Kashmir, is the ideal choice to experience the mystique of the 'Switzerland of India'. Located less than a five-minute drive from the famous attractions of Srinagar, including Dal Lake and Shalimar Bagh, this gorgeous resort offers a quintessential Kashmiri experience with traditional carpets lining the wooden floors, carved architecture enhancing the beauty and traditional artefacts adorning the walls. While being pampered by the renowned Kashmiri hospitality, guests can stay in chic and spacious accommodations and eat at the buzzing Zabarvan Cafe. The resort's views of the orchards and the surrounding mountains will take you to an enchanted heaven from every corner.
offer_address: Chinar Colony Chandpora Harwan Srinagar, J&K 190025
